TopicTitle: A Kerbal that I'm making using Blender

Articles.Content: I just started this today in Blender and I wanted to know what you guys think

Look into "subsurface". you can dramatically reduce the number of faces while dramatically increasing its detail. Also, not sure if that green color is correct, but I could be wrong.

But a good start, no less.
